item.Title: Sign up for MSC updates!
item.Header:
First name -S Last name -S Home Address: -S City:S State: Zip: Home Phone: Cell Phone: Work Phone: -? --- Work_Phone Extension: -? Preferred Phone (can this be a pulldown menu with home, work, cell on it?) -custom email: website: -? --- Web_Page chatname: -? --- Instant_Messenger_Name client: (pulldown menu of: aol, icq, msn, yahoo) --- Instant_Messenger_Service
Please check any of the following MSC Program Areas that you would like to receive more information about:
* Alliance & Coalition Building
MSC works primarily in the following Issue Areas. Please check any that pertain to your work, or that you would like to receive information about:
* Arts & Culture/ Hip Hop Organizing
